item.title: Docs: Do you offer free trials?
item.description:
We do sometimes offer signup credits to professors, researchers, and students but unfortunately we cannot at this time.

We have more demand than available GPUs for our existing customers.

Please check back in later, say a month or so from now, though. (Be sure to sign up and contact us from your school provided email address)
